==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|木|霊}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|木|tr1=ko|t1=tree|霊|tr2=tama|t2=spirit|lang=ja}}. /ko/ is an older and apophonic form of /ki/ found in compounds.
